categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vora was a female Human Sith Warrior who held the rank of Sith Lord during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Lord Vora appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvE gear vendor for the Sith Warrior class on Vaiken Spacedock, though she was later removed in a reorganization of the gear system.
